title: Flayva's
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, International, Organic, Beer/Wine, Central American, Creole, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers vegan options including fruit platters, beans, hash browns and more. Drinks include espresso, latte, coffee with soy milk. Serves an in-house-made veggie/bean burger, fajitas, burritos, quesadillas (ask for no cheese, sour cream, mayonnaise). Try the traditional curry with tofu. Serves breakfast all day. Laid back atmosphere. Free Wi-fi or use computer on premises for free.
